title: Nausea
content: Advice: Eat small, frequent meals and stay hydrated. Avoid strong odors and spicy or greasy foods.

title: Sleep Disturbances
content: Advice: Create a relaxing bedtime routine and avoid caffeine in the evening.

title: Mood swings
content: Some advice content...Advice: Talk to a loved one or therapist, practice relaxation techniques, and engage in activities you enjoy.

title: Morning Sickness
content: Advice: Eat small, frequent meals and stay hydrated. Avoid strong odors and spicy or greasy foods.

title: Fatigue
content: Advice: Get plenty of rest, take short naps during the day, and ask for help with daily tasks.

title: Heartburn and Indigestion
content: Advice: Eat smaller meals, avoid spicy and acidic foods, and try to stay upright after eating.

title: Back Pain
content: Advice: Practice good posture, wear supportive shoes, and consider prenatal yoga or exercise.

title: Swollen Feet and Ankles
content: Advice: Elevate your feet whenever possible, wear comfortable shoes, and avoid sitting or standing for long periods.

title: Frequent Urination
content: Advice: Empty your bladder completely, avoid caffeine, and stay hydrated.

title: Constipation
content: Advice: Eat fiber-rich foods, stay hydrated, and consider gentle exercises like walking.

title: Breast Tenderness
content: Advice: Wear a supportive bra, try warm compresses, and avoid caffeine.

title: Postpartum Depression
content: Advice: Seek support from loved ones and healthcare professionals, and consider counseling or therapy
